metadata.title: CVE-2022-28960 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - high
metadata.description: A PHP injection vulnerability in Spip before v3.2.8 allows attackers toexecute arbitrary PHP code via the _oups parameter at /ecrire.

criterions.comment: spip: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
